thread.title: Another Great Stay at Splendid Etoile -
thread.title_full: Another Great Stay at Splendid Etoile - Review of Splendid Etoile Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: lynMaroubra
title: Another Great Stay at Splendid Etoile -
text: This was my 3rd visit to this Hotel. We had a superior room on the 1st floor and it had a view of the Arc. The room was great as always and the staff we all very friendly and helpful. We were lucky as our room was ready when we arrived at 10.30am. The area is very good with some great restaurants, shopping and food markets. Will be back for another stay when I visit Paris again.
